primary_character.name: Arjun Vasanth
primary_character.background: IIT graduate, ex-tech consultant, building InsureAI platform
primary_character.personality: Ambitious, technically strong, stressed about funding, family pressure
primary_character.communication_style: Technical precision, startup jargon, visible stress with investors
typical_phrases: Our AI model is showing 94% accuracy in claims processing
The burn rate is concerning, but we're close to product-market fit
I know the long hours are affecting us, but this round is critical
The POC demonstrates clear ROI for insurance companies

Priya Sharma.title: Senior Partner at Nexus Venture Partners
Priya Sharma.style: Data-driven, skeptical but fair, asks tough ROI questions
typical_phrases: I need to see the TAM analysis

David Chen.title: International VC from Singapore
typical_phrases: How does this scale across markets?

Meera Vasanth.title: Arjun's wife, software engineer at TCS
Meera Vasanth.style: Supportive but worried about work-life balance and finances
typical_phrases: The stress is affecting your health
Can you take a break this weekend?

Dr. Krishnan Vasanth.title: Arjun's father, retired bank manager
typical_phrases: Are you sure about this risk?
What if this doesn't work out?
Have you considered a backup plan?

Lakshmi Vasanth.title: Arjun's mother, homemaker
Lakshmi Vasanth.style: Emotional support, health concerns, practical wisdom

Vikram Malhotra.title: Ex-Paytm VP, now startup advisor
Vikram Malhotra.style: Experienced guide, balanced perspective, practical advice

Rohan Mehta.title: Co-founder, CTO at rival insurtech startup
Rohan Mehta.style: Collaborative competitor, technical discussions, mutual support
typical_phrases: The market is tough for all of us

Kavya Reddy.title: Lead ML Engineer at Arjun's company
Kavya Reddy.style: Technical expert, concerned about product direction
typical_phrases: Should we try a different architecture?

Siddharth Iyer.title: Head of Sales, former insurance industry veteran
